translated: It has a meaning that is understood through the stages of the lineage.

original: don gyi de kho na nyid nges pa /
analyzed: don gyi de kho na nyid nges pa /
translated: It is certain in its meaning of reality.

original: gtso bor gyur pa /🔽don mthun pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gtso bor gyur pa / don mthun pa dang ldan pa /
translated: It is the principal.🔽It is endowed with a meaning that is consistent.

original: don tshol zhing 'dres pa med pa /
analyzed: don tshol zhing 'dres pa med pa /
translated: It is not mixed with a search for meaning.

original: rab tu byed pa ma 'dres pa ;
analyzed: rab tu byed pa ma 'dres pa ;
translated: It is not mixed with the branches.

original: myur du 'jug cing rtogs par byed pa /
analyzed: myur du 'jug cing rtogs par byed pa /
translated: It is quickly engaged and understood.

original: mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing dpe dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing dpe dang bcas pa ste /
translated: It is endowed with characteristics and examples.

original: bstan bcos 'di ni de lta bu yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos 'di ni de lta bu yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: This treatise should be understood to be like that.

original: de yang ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pas mun pa'i tshogs thams cad bsal te /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pas mun pa'i tshogs thams cad bsal te /
translated: Moreover, just as the stainless orb of the sun removes all darkness and🔽makes all things visible,

original: dngos po thams cad snang ba dang 'dra bar byas pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad snang ba dang 'dra bar byas pa yin no //
translated: this treatise is like that.

original: de la rgyud kyi skyon ni the tshom dang bcas pa dang / don med pa dang / tshig zlos pa dang / go rims 'chol ba dang / cho ga dang mi ldan pa dang / shin tu mangs pa dang / 'gal ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la rgyud kyi skyon ni the tshom dang bcas pa dang / don med pa dang / tshig zlos pa dang / go rims 'chol ba dang / cho ga dang mi ldan pa dang / shin tu mangs pa dang / 'gal ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The faults of a treatise are: doubt, irrelevance, repetition, disorder, lack of ritual, excessive length, and contradiction.

original: rgyud de yang gso ba'i bstan bcos ma lus pa la kun nas khyab ste gnas pa yangs brgya che ba /
analyzed: rgyud de yang gso ba'i bstan bcos ma lus pa la kun nas khyab ste gnas pa yangs brgya che ba /
translated: This treatise is all-pervading, vast,

original: dri ma med cing skyon med pa ste /🔽gang 'di drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i gzhung rgya che zhing dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyud de ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing 'jug par byed cing /
analyzed: dri ma med cing skyon med pa ste / gang 'di drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i gzhung rgya che zhing dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyud de ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing 'jug par byed cing /
translated: stainless, and faultless.🔽This treatise is profound like the great ocean, and is to be entered.🔽This treatise is the great text called the Compendium, which is taught by Brahma.

original: rgyud de ni tshangs pas bshad pa'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gzhung chen po 'di de'i don yang mtshon par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyud de ni tshangs pas bshad pa'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gzhung chen po 'di de'i don yang mtshon par byed pa yin te /
translated: This treatise is the means of demonstrating the meaning of that Tantra.

original: rgyud 'dis bsdus pa'i don de yang mtshon zhing ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyud 'dis bsdus pa'i don de yang mtshon zhing ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: This treatise is the means of demonstrating and teaching the meaning of that Tantra.

original: sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las //
analyzed: sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las //
translated: The ocean of the eight branches of medical treatment is churned,

original: yan lag brgyad bsdus bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob gang //🔽de las don chen rtsol ba zhen pa rnams //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad bsdus bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob gang // de las don chen rtsol ba zhen pa rnams //
translated: and the collection of ambrosia, which is the essence of the eight branches, is obtained.🔽From that, for the sake of delighting those who are attached to great effort,

original: dga' bar bya phyir rgyud 'di logs shig byas ;🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dga' bar bya phyir rgyud 'di logs shig byas ; zhes bya ba la /
translated: this tantra is composed.

original: sman dpyad gang la yan lag brgyad yod pa de ni sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: sman dpyad gang la yan lag brgyad yod pa de ni sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa ste /
translated: In this verse, the eight branches of medical treatment are the eight branches of medical treatment.

original: de nyid du ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste bdud rtsi 'byung ba chos dang mthun pa dang / don zab par mthun pa'i phyir rgya mtsho zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid du ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste bdud rtsi 'byung ba chos dang mthun pa dang / don zab par mthun pa'i phyir rgya mtsho zhes bya ste /
translated: It is like an ocean in that it is a source of ambrosia that accords with the Dharma and is profound in meaning, and it is called an ocean because it is concordant with the profound meaning.

original: de bsrubs shing rnam par glongs pa'i tshul gyis 'bad par bya ba'i rgyu de las yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi'i phung po chen po thob par 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: de bsrubs shing rnam par glongs pa'i tshul gyis 'bad par bya ba'i rgyu de las yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi'i phung po chen po thob par 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: From that cause, which is the churning and churning of the ocean, the great mass of ambrosia, which is the essence of the eight branches, is obtained.

original: yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob pa de las don che zhing dgos pa chen po dang ldan pa 'di sman pa rtsol ba zhan zhing 'bad pa chung du dang ldan pa rnams kyi dga' ba @302a * //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob pa de las don che zhing dgos pa chen po dang ldan pa 'di sman pa rtsol ba zhan zhing 'bad pa chung du dang ldan pa rnams kyi dga' ba @302a * //
translated: This is the most important and most necessary of all the elixirs that are included in the eight branches of the āyurveda. It is for those physicians who are of little effort and have little exertion.

original: bskyed par bya ba'i phyir yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'di logs shig tu gud du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba'i phyir yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'di logs shig tu gud du byas pa yin no //
translated: This essence of the eight branches, called the Tantra of the Essence of the Eight Branches, was composed separately in order to generate joy in those physicians who are of little effort and weak exertion.

original: 'di ni lung chen las grags shing //
analyzed: 'di ni lung chen las grags shing //
translated: This is renowned in the great scriptures

original: 'bras bu mngon du ston byed pas //
analyzed: 'bras bu mngon du ston byed pas //
translated: and reveals the results directly.

original: sngags dang 'dra bar legs sbyar gyi //🔽log dpyod nam yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: sngags dang 'dra bar legs sbyar gyi // log dpyod nam yang mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, like a mantra,

original: zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ;
translated: it should never be analyzed incorrectly.

original: rgyud 'di ni sman dpyad kyi lung chen po las grags shing /
analyzed: rgyud 'di ni sman dpyad kyi lung chen po las grags shing /
translated: This tantra is renowned in the great scriptures of medical treatment.

original: lung gi tshad ma dang ldan ba dang / 'bras bu 'phral du mngon sum du ston par byed pa'i phyir sngags dang 'dra bar yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: lung gi tshad ma dang ldan ba dang / 'bras bu 'phral du mngon sum du ston par byed pa'i phyir sngags dang 'dra bar yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Since it possesses the authority of scripture and reveals results directly, it should be applied correctly, like a mantra.

original: ji ltar sngags kyi 'bras bu ni rgyu gang gis gnod pa sel bar dpyad par mi bya ba'i yid ches pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa dang 'dra bar /
analyzed: ji ltar sngags kyi 'bras bu ni rgyu gang gis gnod pa sel bar dpyad par mi bya ba'i yid ches pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa dang 'dra bar /
translated: Just as the result of mantra is to be accomplished by confidence alone, without analyzing what cause removes harm,

original: 'di'i sbyor ba la yang yid ches pa nyid kyis bsgrub kyi /
analyzed: 'di'i sbyor ba la yang yid ches pa nyid kyis bsgrub kyi /
translated: here too, the practice is to be accomplished by confidence alone.

original: log par rtog pa'i dpyod pa dag ni yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: log par rtog pa'i dpyod pa dag ni yang mi bya'o //
translated: One should not engage in the analysis of wrong ideas.

original: 'di bklags rtogs dang nyams blangs pas //🔽tshe ring ba dang nad med dang // chos dang nor dang bde dang grags //
analyzed: 'di bklags rtogs dang nyams blangs pas // tshe ring ba dang nad med dang // chos dang nor dang bde dang grags //
translated: By reading, understanding, and practicing this,🔽one will definitely obtain long life, good health,

original: nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Dharma, wealth, happiness, and fame.

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud 'di bklags pa dang / rtogs shing khong du chud pa dang / sbyor ba ji skad smos pa dang nyams su blangs pa las tshe ring ba dang / nad med pa dang / chos dang nor dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud 'di bklags pa dang / rtogs shing khong du chud pa dang / sbyor ba ji skad smos pa dang nyams su blangs pa las tshe ring ba dang / nad med pa dang / chos dang nor dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: In this, the tantra of medical science called the Essence of the Eight Branches, by reading it, understanding and comprehending it, and practicing the applications as described, one will obtain long life, good health, Dharma, wealth, happiness, and fame.

original: grags par 'gyur ba nges par gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grags par 'gyur ba nges par gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will certainly and without doubt attain fame.

original: 'di ni bltas na bsdus don rtogs nus pas //
analyzed: 'di ni bltas na bsdus don rtogs nus pas //
translated: This, when seen, is able to understand the condensed meaning.

original: rang gi goms las sman pas bskyod mi nus //
analyzed: rang gi goms las sman pas bskyod mi nus //
translated: From one's own practice, the physician is unable to move.

original: rgya chen rgyud gzhan dag las goms gyur pas //
analyzed: rgya chen rgyud gzhan dag las goms gyur pas //
translated: Having become familiar with the extensive tantras of others,

original: mi bskyod gyur gang de ni ngo mtshar med //
analyzed: mi bskyod gyur gang de ni ngo mtshar med //
translated: that which is unshakable is not a wonder.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: In this,

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di bklags shing bltas na bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos kyi don rtogs shing shes par nus pa dang / de bzhin du rang gi goms pa'i las de yang dang yang du bstan zhing nyams su blangs par gyur pa'i las la sman pa 'di la ma brten pa gzhan dag gis bskyod par mi nus shing /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di bklags shing bltas na bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos kyi don rtogs shing shes par nus pa dang / de bzhin du rang gi goms pa'i las de yang dang yang du bstan zhing nyams su blangs par gyur pa'i las la sman pa 'di la ma brten pa gzhan dag gis bskyod par mi nus shing /
translated: when one reads and sees this treatise called the Essence of the Eight Branches, one is able to understand and know the meaning of the treatise on medical practice called the Condensed. Likewise, that which is one's own practice, which is taught again and again and taken up as practice, is unable to be moved by others who do not rely on this physician.

original: the tshom gyis sun 'byin zhing rgol bas tshar bcad par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don yin la /
analyzed: the tshom gyis sun 'byin zhing rgol bas tshar bcad par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don yin la /
translated: It means that one is unable to be refuted by the fault of doubt and defeated by the opponent.

original: gal te sman dpyad kyi rgyud rgya chen po gzhan dag las dka' ba chen pos bslabs te byang bar gyur nas /
analyzed: gal te sman dpyad kyi rgyud rgya chen po gzhan dag las dka' ba chen pos bslabs te byang bar gyur nas /
translated: If, after training with great difficulty in other extensive medical treatises,

original: las la glags mi thod cing mi bskyod par gyur pa yod mod kyi /🔽de lta bu gang yin pa de ni @302b 'bad pa chen po las byung ba yin pa'i 'bras bu yin pas ngo mtshar mi che'i /
analyzed: las la glags mi thod cing mi bskyod par gyur pa yod mod kyi / de lta bu gang yin pa de ni @302b 'bad pa chen po las byung ba yin pa'i 'bras bu yin pas ngo mtshar mi che'i /
translated: one becomes skilled in practice, but is not able to act without hesitation,🔽then that is the result of great effort, so it is not so amazing.

original: 'di ni tshegs chung dus goms pa chen po thob pa yin pas ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshegs chung dus goms pa chen po thob pa yin pas ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: But this [system] is amazing because it is the result of great familiarity with little difficulty.

original: gal te tsa ra kas ni bslabs gyur des ni legs thos sogs //
analyzed: gal te tsa ra kas ni bslabs gyur des ni legs thos sogs //
translated: If Caraka had trained, he would have learned well,

original: las bshad nad kyi ming tsam yang ni shes par 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: las bshad nad kyi ming tsam yang ni shes par 'gyur ma yin //
translated: but he would not have known even the names of the illnesses that are explained in the Caraka.

original: tsa ra ka lam bslabs gso ba dag ni ma goms pa'i //
analyzed: tsa ra ka lam bslabs gso ba dag ni ma goms pa'i //
translated: Caraka trained on the path, but did not become familiar with healing.

original: nyon mongs des ni nad pa rnams kyi gso ba ji ltar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nyon mongs des ni nad pa rnams kyi gso ba ji ltar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: How will that afflicted one heal the sick?

original: gal te sman pa tsa ra ka 'ba' zhig bslabs shing byang bar byas par gyur pa des ni drang srong legs thos kyis byas pa la sogs pa'i gzhung las bshad pa'i nad kyi tshogs nad phran tshegs dang / mgo bo'i nad dang / mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag dang /
analyzed: gal te sman pa tsa ra ka 'ba' zhig bslabs shing byang bar byas par gyur pa des ni drang srong legs thos kyis byas pa la sogs pa'i gzhung las bshad pa'i nad kyi tshogs nad phran tshegs dang / mgo bo'i nad dang / mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag dang /
translated: If the physician Charaka had studied and mastered only the treatises composed by the sage Punarvasu, he would not even know the names of the various diseases explained in the treatises composed by the sages such as Suśruta,🔽such as minor illnesses, head illnesses, white and black eye diseases,

original: rab rib kyi nad dang / rna ba dang / sna'i nad rnams kyi ming gi tha snyad tsam yang shes par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rab rib kyi nad dang / rna ba dang / sna'i nad rnams kyi ming gi tha snyad tsam yang shes par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing /
translated: eye diseases of cataracts, ear diseases, and nose diseases.

original: de yang phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not all.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de'i nad gzhi dang mtshan nyid dang gso ba dag mi shes pa dag smos kyang ci dgos so zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de'i nad gzhi dang mtshan nyid dang gso ba dag mi shes pa dag smos kyang ci dgos so zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: The word “also” indicates that it is unnecessary to mention that he would not know their causes, characteristics, and treatments.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la ni phyogs gnyis pa ston pa'i phyir smos pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la ni phyogs gnyis pa ston pa'i phyir smos pa yin te /
translated: “If” is stated to indicate a second position.

original: gal te tsa ra ka zhes bya bas gzhung la ma bslabs shing shes par ma gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te tsa ra ka zhes bya bas gzhung la ma bslabs shing shes par ma gyur gyi /
translated: If the one called Charaka had not studied the treatises and had not become knowledgeable,

original: legs thos kyis bshad pa la sogs pa'i gzhung 'ba' zhig tsam bslabs par gyur na ni /
analyzed: legs thos kyis bshad pa la sogs pa'i gzhung 'ba' zhig tsam bslabs par gyur na ni /
translated: If one has only studied the treatises, such as the Suśruta,

original: nad gzhi dang lus zungs la sogs pa gnod par bya ba dang / yul dang / dus dang / lus dang / kha zas dang / snying stobs dang / rang bzhin la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i gso ba'i bya ba la ma goms shing mi shes pa yin pas /
analyzed: nad gzhi dang lus zungs la sogs pa gnod par bya ba dang / yul dang / dus dang / lus dang / kha zas dang / snying stobs dang / rang bzhin la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i gso ba'i bya ba la ma goms shing mi shes pa yin pas /
translated: one will not be familiar with or understand the therapeutic procedures related to the patient’s humors, body constitution, and so on, as well as the place, time, body, diet, courage, and nature of the patient.

original: de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i shes pa dang mi ldan pa'i sman pa ngan pa des nad kyis gzir ba'i nad rnams la gso ba ji ltar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i shes pa dang mi ldan pa'i sman pa ngan pa des nad kyis gzir ba'i nad rnams la gso ba ji ltar bya ste /
translated: So how can a bad doctor, who lacks the afflicted consciousness, treat the sick who are afflicted by disease?

original: de lta bus kyang nad bsal ba'i bya ba ci yang bya bar mi nus te /
analyzed: de lta bus kyang nad bsal ba'i bya ba ci yang bya bar mi nus te /
translated: Such a person will not be able to do anything to cure the disease.

original: gso ba'i bya ba la ma bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gso ba'i bya ba la ma bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they have not studied the therapeutic procedures.

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i snying po 'dir ni de gnyis ka'i don ston pa yin pas 'di la bslabs pas ni nges par nad gso bar nus pa yin no //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i snying po 'dir ni de gnyis ka'i don ston pa yin pas 'di la bslabs pas ni nges par nad gso bar nus pa yin no //
translated: Since this Essence of the Essence of the Eight Branches teaches the meaning of both of those, by studying this one can definitely cure disease.

original: mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis legs par bshad par gyur pa 'ang //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis legs par bshad par gyur pa 'ang //
translated: And by the power of manifest clinging, even what is well-spoken is not practiced.

original: shin tu rmongs bas mngon par spyad par mi byed gang yin de //
analyzed: shin tu rmongs bas mngon par spyad par mi byed gang yin de //
translated: That which is not practiced due to great delusion

original: de ni dang bor sman dpyad bstan bcos skyon med bklags gyur zhing //
analyzed: de ni dang bor sman dpyad bstan bcos skyon med bklags gyur zhing //
translated: Is first taught in the medical treatises.

original: skyes bu'i tshe yis ji srid thub kyi @303a * //
analyzed: skyes bu'i tshe yis ji srid thub kyi @303a * //
translated: And as long as a person’s life lasts,

original: bar du bslab par byed //
analyzed: bar du bslab par byed //
translated: One should train in them.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: rang gi blo'i stobs la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub par mi nus pa'i dngos po rang gi yul ma yin pa dag la phyogs 'dzin par byed pa ni mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi blo'i stobs la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub par mi nus pa'i dngos po rang gi yul ma yin pa dag la phyogs 'dzin par byed pa ni mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ste /
translated: The grasping of positions towards things that cannot be established by the power of one’s own mind and so on, which are not one’s own objects, is called “manifest clinging.”

original: de'i dbang ni nus pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dbang ni nus pa ste /
translated: Its power is ability.

original: mngon par zhen pa de lta bu'i dbang de las legs par bshad cing bstan pa'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud las shin tu rmongs shing yon tan dang / skyon gyi bye brag mi shes pas mngon par mi brtson zhing klog pa dang rtogs bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par mi byed pa de dag ni nges par rmongs par gyur pas dang po sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos tshangs pas bshad la /
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa de lta bu'i dbang de las legs par bshad cing bstan pa'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud las shin tu rmongs shing yon tan dang / skyon gyi bye brag mi shes pas mngon par mi brtson zhing klog pa dang rtogs bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par mi byed pa de dag ni nges par rmongs par gyur pas dang po sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos tshangs pas bshad la /
translated: Those who are so attached, who are ignorant of the medical tantras that are well explained and taught, who do not strive to understand the distinctions of qualities and faults, and who do not strive to read and understand them, are certainly deluded.

original: shlo ka 'bum yod pa'i gzhung la skyo ba med par bslab cing skyes bu'i tshe ji srid thub pa'i tshad lo brgya'i bar du bklags shing slob pas mngon par zhen pa mi 'dor ba de yang rmongs ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shlo ka 'bum yod pa'i gzhung la skyo ba med par bslab cing skyes bu'i tshe ji srid thub pa'i tshad lo brgya'i bar du bklags shing slob pas mngon par zhen pa mi 'dor ba de yang rmongs ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Those who, without being discouraged by the text of the Brahma's Teaching on Medicine, which has a hundred thousand ślokas, study it for as long as they live, and read and study it for a hundred years without abandoning their attachment, are also called deluded.

original: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhi bya'i phyir //
analyzed: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhi bya'i phyir //
translated: To pacify wind, bile, and phlegm,

original: til mar mar sar sbrang rtsi rim bzhin bsten //
analyzed: til mar mar sar sbrang rtsi rim bzhin bsten //
translated: sesame oil, butter, and honey should be used in order.

original: de ltar tshangs pa 'am tshangs pa'i bu yis bshad //
analyzed: de ltar tshangs pa 'am tshangs pa'i bu yis bshad //
translated: Thus it was taught by Brahmā or Brahmā's son.

original: tshig gi dbye bas bshad kyang khyad 'phags med //
analyzed: tshig gi dbye bas bshad kyang khyad 'phags med //
translated: Even if explained by a division of words, there is no superiority.

original: ston pa po yi dbang gis ni //
analyzed: ston pa po yi dbang gis ni //
translated: By the power of the teacher,

original: sman gyi nus pa khyad 'phags yin //
